categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Skirmish in the secret Imperial detention center

In 8 ABY, a skirmish took place in a secret Imperial detention center on the planet Coruscant. A group of underdwellers led by the IT-3 Interrogator droid "It" brought a stolen datapad, as well as the Wookiee youngling Lumpawarrump to the detention center, and were followed by Lumpawarrump's parents Chewbacca and Mallatobuck. The skirmish saw "It" destroyed and the datapad retrieved.
